verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> of the desert יָ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea כְּסוּפ֤וֹת <WH5492> As whirlwinds בַּנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> in the south לַֽחֲלֹ֔ף <WH2498> pass מִמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> from the desert בָּ֔א <WH935> through [so] it cometh מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> land נוֹרָאָֽה׃ <WH3372> from a terrible

חָז֥וּת <WH2380> vision קָשָׁ֖ה <WH7186> A grievous הֻגַּד־ <WH5046> is declared לִ֑י הַבּוֹגֵ֤ד ׀ <WH898> unto me the treacherous dealer בּוֹגֵד֙ <WH898> dealeth treacherously וְהַשּׁוֹדֵ֣ד ׀ <WH7703> and the spoiler שׁוֹדֵ֔ד <WH7703> spoileth עֲלִ֤י <WH5927> Go up עֵילָם֙ <WH5867> O Elam צוּרִ֣י <WH6696> besiege מָדַ֔י <WH4074> O Media כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אַנְחָתָ֖ה <WH585> all the sighing הִשְׁבַּֽתִּי׃ <WH7673> thereof have I made to cease

עַל־ <WH5921> For כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> this מָלְא֤וּ <WH4390> filled מָתְנַי֙ <WH4975> Therefore are my loins חַלְחָלָ֔ה <WH2479> with pain צִירִ֣ים <WH6735> pangs אֲחָז֔וּנִי <WH270> have taken hold כְּצִירֵ֖י <WH6735> upon me as the pangs יֽוֹלֵדָ֑ה <WH3205> of a woman that travaileth נַעֲוֵ֣יתִי <WH5753> I was bowed down מִשְּׁמֹ֔עַ <WH8085> at the hearing נִבְהַ֖לְתִּי <WH926> [of it] I was dismayed מֵרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> at the seeing

תָּעָ֣ה <WH8582> panted לְבָבִ֔י <WH3824> My heart פַּלָּצ֖וּת <WH6427> fearfulness בִּֽעֲתָ֑תְנִי <WH1204> affrighted אֵ֚ת <WH853> נֶ֣שֶׁף <WH5399> me the night חִשְׁקִ֔י <WH2837> of my pleasure שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> hath he turned לִ֖י לַחֲרָדָֽה׃ <WH2731> into fear

עָרֹ֧ךְ <WH6186> Prepare הַשֻּׁלְחָ֛ן <WH7979> the table צָפֹ֥ה <WH6823> spread הַצָּפִ֖ית <WH6823> spread אָכ֣וֹל <WH398> eat שָׁתֹ֑ה <WH8354> drink ק֥וּמוּ <WH6965> arise הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> ye princes מִשְׁח֥וּ <WH4886> [and] anoint מָגֵֽן׃ <WH4043> the shield פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> said אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> For thus hath the Lord לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go הַעֲמֵ֣ד <WH5975> set הַֽמְצַפֶּ֔ה <WH6822> a watchman אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> what he seeth יַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> let him declare

וְרָ֣אָה <WH7200> And he saw רֶ֗כֶב <WH7393> a chariot צֶ֚מֶד <WH6776> [with] a couple פָּֽרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> of horsemen רֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> a chariot חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> of asses רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> [and] a chariot גָּמָ֑ל <WH1581> of camels וְהִקְשִׁ֥יב <WH7181> and he hearkened קֶ֖שֶׁב <WH7182> diligently רַב־ <WH7227> with much קָֽשֶׁב׃ <WH7182> heed

וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> And he cried אַרְיֵ֑ה <WH738> A lion עַל־ <WH5921> Then מִצְפֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH4707> upon the watchtower אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> My lord אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I עֹמֵ֤ד <WH5975> I stand תָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> continually יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> in the daytime וְעַל־ <WH5921> at מִ֨שְׁמַרְתִּ֔י <WH4931> in my ward אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> and I נִצָּ֖ב <WH5324> and I am set כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> whole nights

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> now behold זֶ֥ה <WH2088> here בָא֙ <WH935> And behold here cometh רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> a chariot אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> of men צֶ֖מֶד <WH6776> [with] a couple פָּֽרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> of horsemen וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> And he answered וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said נָפְלָ֤ה <WH5307> is fallen נָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> is fallen בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> Babylon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all פְּסִילֵ֥י <WH6456> and all the graven images אֱלֹהֶ֖יהָ <WH430> of her gods שִׁבַּ֥ר <WH7665> he hath broken לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> unto the ground

מְדֻשָׁתִ֖י <WH4098> O my threshing וּבֶן־ <WH1121> and the corn גָּרְנִ֑י <WH1637> of my floor אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> What שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> that which I have heard מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הִגַּ֥דְתִּי <WH5046> have I declared לָכֶֽם׃ ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden דּוּמָ֑ה <WH1746> of Dumah אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about קֹרֵ֣א <WH7121> He calleth מִשֵּׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> to me out of Seir שֹׁמֵר֙ <WH8104> Watchman מַה־ <WH4100> how מִלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> night שֹׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> Watchman מַה־ <WH4100> how מִלֵּֽיל׃ <WH3915> night

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said שֹׁמֵ֔ר <WH8104> The watchman אָתָ֥ה <WH857> cometh בֹ֖קֶר <WH1242> The morning וְגַם־ <WH1571> also לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> and also the night אִם־ <WH518> If תִּבְעָי֥וּן <WH1158> if ye will enquire בְּעָ֖יוּ <WH1158> enquire שֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> ye return אֵתָֽיוּ׃ <WH857> come ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden בַּעְרָ֑ב <WH6152> upon Arabia בַּיַּ֤עַר <WH3293> In the forest בַּעְרַב֙ <WH6152> in Arabia תָּלִ֔ינוּ <WH3885> shall ye lodge אֹֽרְח֖וֹת <WH736> O ye travelling companies דְּדָנִֽים׃ <WH1720> of Dedanim

לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> to him צָמֵ֖א <WH6771> that was thirsty הֵתָ֣יוּ <WH857> brought מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> The inhabitants אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land תֵּימָ֔א <WH8485> of Tema בְּלַחְמ֖וֹ <WH3899> with their bread קִדְּמ֥וּ <WH6923> they prevented נֹדֵֽד׃ <WH5074> him that fled

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from חֲרָב֖וֹת <WH2719> the swords נָדָ֑דוּ <WH5074> For they fled מִפְּנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> from חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> sword נְטוּשָׁ֗ה <WH5203> the drawn וּמִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> and from קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> bow דְּרוּכָ֔ה <WH1869> the bent וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> and from כֹּ֥בֶד <WH3514> the grievousness מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֛ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> said אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> For thus hath the Lord אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about בְּע֤וֹד <WH5750> In שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> unto me Within a year כִּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> according to the years שָׂכִ֔יר <WH7916> of an hireling וְכָלָ֖ה <WH3615> shall fail כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> and all the glory קֵדָֽר׃ <WH6938> of Kedar

וּשְׁאָ֧ר <WH7605> And the residue מִסְפַּר־ <WH4557> of the number קֶ֛שֶׁת <WH7198> of archers גִּבּוֹרֵ֥י <WH1368> the mighty men בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children קֵדָ֖ר <WH6938> of Kedar יִמְעָ֑טוּ <WH4591> shall be diminished כִּ֛י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס
